EXTRACTED VALUE: GUN is a very fun game to mess around with, yet playing the Xbox 360 version felt very underwhelming when compared to the Xbox version.
It makes it hard to justify paying extra for a game that can be bought cheaper on another console.
A mediocre football game. Madden NFL 06 is the Xbox 360's first budget title, it’s just too bad the game isn’t priced that way.
Jaw-droppingly beautiful to look at, no worse to play than its excellent originator, but not really that much of a step forward. New balls, please!
The player needs to be given much more freedom.
Anyway, 07 plays just fine, but once again this edition leaves you wanting (and expecting) much more. [Dec. 2006, p.132]
I'd recommend keeping your copy of NHL 2K7 and pretending this year's version never actually came out. Like an NHL videogamers lockout or something.
Overlord has a neat idea, but it really needs more direction. Or should I say directions? [Aug 2007, p.77]
If you have never played Battlefield 2 before, give it a rental. If you have... Avoid this and get the PC version
Chromehounds is an excellent online game, but the single-player suffers because of it, making it no use for anyone without a Gold Live account.
A poor offline game tagged onto a very good online game.
Tony Hawk's Proving Ground is a game that is stuck in the rut of its predecessors.
Demands forgiveness for being over-the-top in its attempt to be wacky. [Jan 2006, p.46]
A bit too silly to be considered a serious shooter.
